`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.figcaption,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-title":"","data-language":"typescript","data-theme":"github-dark",children:"contentlayer.config.js"}),(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{tabIndex:"0","data-language":"typescript","data-theme":"github-dark",__rawString__:`import { defineDocumentType, makeSource } from "contentlayer/source-files";\r
\r
/** @type {import('contentlayer/source-files').ComputedFields} */\r
const computedFields = {\r
  slug: {\r
    type: "string",\r
    resolve: (doc) => \`/\${doc._raw.flattenedPath}\`,\r
  },\r
  slugAsParams: {\r
    type: "string",\r
    resolve: (doc) => doc._raw.flattenedPath.split("/").slice(1).join("/"),\r
  },\r
};\r
\r
export const Doc = defineDocumentType(() => ({\r
  name: "Doc",\r
  filePathPattern: \`docs/**/*.mdx\`,\r
  contentType: "mdx",\r
  fields: {\r
    title: {\r
      type: "string",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
    description: {\r
      type: "string",\r
    },\r
    published: {\r
      type: "boolean",\r
      default: true,\r
    },\r
  },\r
  computedFields,\r
}));\r
\r
export const Guide = defineDocumentType(() => ({\r
  name: "Guide",\r
  filePathPattern: \`guides/**/*.mdx\`,\r
  contentType: "mdx",\r
  fields: {\r
    title: {\r
      type: "string",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
    description: {\r
      type: "string",\r
    },\r
    date: {\r
      type: "date",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
    published: {\r
      type: "boolean",\r
      default: true,\r
    },\r
    featured: {\r
      type: "boolean",\r
      default: false,\r
    },\r
  },\r
  computedFields,\r
}));\r
\r
export const Post = defineDocumentType(() => ({\r
  name: "Post",\r
  filePathPattern: \`blog/**/*.mdx\`,\r
  contentType: "mdx",\r
  fields: {\r
    title: {\r
      type: "string",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
    description: {\r
      type: "string",\r
    },\r
    date: {\r
      type: "date",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
    published: {\r
      type: "boolean",\r
      default: true,\r
    },\r
    image: {\r
      type: "string",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
    authors: {\r
      type: "list",\r
      of: { type: "string" },\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
  },\r
  computedFields,\r
}));\r
\r
export const Page = defineDocumentType(() => ({\r
  name: "Page",\r
  filePathPattern: \`pages/**/*.mdx\`,\r
  contentType: "mdx",\r
  fields: {\r
    title: {\r
      type: "string",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
    description: {\r
      type: "string",\r
    },\r
  },\r
  computedFields,\r
}));\r
\r
export default makeSource({\r
  contentDirPath: "./content",\r
  documentTypes: [Page, Doc, Guide, Post],\r
  mdx: {},\r
});
